Description: With Google's free online calendar, it's easy to keep track of life's important events all in one place.
Name: Google Calendar

Methods.Name: List Calendars
Methods.Description: Gets a list of the calendars.

Methods.Name: List Calendar Busy
Methods.Description: Returns busy information for a calendar.

Methods.Name: List Calendar(s) Busy
Methods.Description: Returns free/busy information for a set of calendars.

Methods.Name: Get Next Available Calendar Timeslot
Methods.Description: Get the next available time slot for a calendar.

Methods.Name: Create Event
Methods.Description: Creates an event in a calendar.

Methods.Name: List Event Instances
Methods.Description: Gets instances of the specified recurring event.

Methods.Name: Delete Event
Methods.Description: Deletes an event from a calendar.

Methods.Name: Update Event
Methods.Description: Updates the specified event in a calendar.

Methods.Name: List Updated Events
Methods.Description: Gets new and updated events from a calendar.

Methods.Name: List New Events
Methods.Description: Gets new events from a calendar.

Methods.Name: Get Event
Methods.Description: Gets an event from a calendar.
